item.title: docker安装php和nginx
item.description: 如果安装前没有配置文件，需要先挂载一个目录把配置文件拷贝出来 nignx 安装 docker run -p 80:80 -p 7100-7200:7100-7200 --name=nginx \ -v /Users/xxx/docker/lnmp/www:/www \ -v /Users/xxx/docker/lnmp/nginx/log:/var/log/nginx \ -v /Users/xxx/docker/lnmp/nginx/conf.d:/etc/nginx/conf.d \ -v /Users/xxx/docker/lnmp/nginx/nginx.conf:/etc/nginx/nginx.conf \ -v /Users/xxx/docker/lnmp/nginx/fastcgi_params:/etc/nginx/fastcgi_params \ -v /Users/xxx/docker/lnmp/nginx/mime.types:/etc/nginx/mime.types \ -v /Users/xxx/docker/lnmp/nginx/scgi_params:/etc/nginx/scgi_params \ -v /Users/xxx/docker/lnmp/nginx/uwsgi_params:/etc/nginx/uwsgi_params \ -v /Users/xxx/docker/lnmp/nginx/hosts:/etc/hosts \ nginx P
